gw.api.financials

Class MoneyComponentFacade

  • gw.api.financials.MoneyComponentFacade
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMutableMoney, IPairedMoney

    public class MoneyComponentFacade
implements IPairedMoney, IMutableMoney
    A set of methods used by CurrencyInput and CurrencyCell to display a multicurrency money amount. The BigDecimal amount is the money amount, and the Currency is the currency of the amount.

    A SecondaryComponent may be linked to the primary amount, which usually represents the primary amount in the claim currency (i.e. default currency). If the currency of the primary and secondary amounts differ, the secondary amount will be displayed underneath the first. If they do not differ, then only the primary amount is displayed.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      BigDecimal calcSecondaryAmount(BigDecimal value, BigDecimal exchangeRateOverride)
      Calculates hypothetical secondary amount from the given primary amount, but does not update the secondary value.
      void setAmount(BigDecimal value)
      {@inheritDoc}
      void setAmount(BigDecimal value, BigDecimal exchangeRateOverride)
      Sets the amount on this MoneyComponentFacade and the secondary component, if the secondary exists. Pass null to exchangeRateOverride to use the current market exchange rates.
      CurrencyAmount toCurrencyAmount()
      Converts this IMoney into a CurrencyAmount. Returns null if this IMoney's Amount is null. Otherwise, returns a CurrencyAmount whose amount and currency are equal to this IMoney's.

      • toCurrencyAmount

        CurrencyAmount toCurrencyAmount()
        Converts this IMoney into a CurrencyAmount. Returns null if this IMoney's Amount is null. Otherwise, returns a CurrencyAmount whose amount and currency are equal to this IMoney's.

      • calcSecondaryAmount

        BigDecimal calcSecondaryAmount(BigDecimal value,
                             BigDecimal exchangeRateOverride)
        Calculates hypothetical secondary amount from the given primary amount, but does not update the secondary value.
        Parameters:
        value - primary amount
        exchangeRateOverride - if null, overrides the default exchange rate
        Returns:
        may be null

      • setAmount

        void setAmount(BigDecimal value,
             BigDecimal exchangeRateOverride)
        Sets the amount on this MoneyComponentFacade and the secondary component, if the secondary exists. Pass null to exchangeRateOverride to use the current market exchange rates.
        Parameters:
        value - amount for the this component
        exchangeRateOverride - if specified and the secondary currency differs from the primary, this value will override the default exchange rate between these two currencies when calculating value for the secondary component.
